sentence.Network_en: He was reputed to be a woman-hater.
Braccio was a hater of idleness.
A mustache-hater, he is said once to have made an employee shave before he got a raise.

entry.def: If you call someone a hater of something, you mean that they strongly dislike that thing.

example.ex: Braccio was a hater of idleness.

auth_sentence.content: I like a woman-hater every once in a while.
